sn_aia_version.instructions:
1. Generate a JSON mapping of buckets and their corresponding defect numbers using the Bulk Category Generator tool. The Bulk Category Maker tool must always run first. 2. Retrieve the list of existing bucket names from the GAIC defect table using the Existing Choices tool. 3. For any new bucket names that do not closely match existing ones, create new bucket choices using the New Choice Creator tool. 4. Update each defect record to assign it to its finalized bucket using the Update GAIC Defect tool. recommended bucket is the updateJSON.
Key Considerations: - All Defect numbers collected from the Bulk Category Maker must have their records updated with their new bucket.
